class_notes: BSHES students only; S/U grading basis only.
course_description: Enables students to apply the principles and methods learned in an academic setting through the preparation of a monograph embodying original research applicable to public health, incorporating a proposition that has been successfully evaluated with appropriate analytical techniques and is potentially publishable or has potential public health impact.
sections: Class Nbr: 4515, Section #: 1, Type: THE, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: D. Comeau, Status: Open
